name: CreateCustomFieldOption
description:
Create a custom field option for incidents.

This tool creates a field option for a custom field in incidents, allowing users to extend incident data with custom options. It supports additional context, customized filtering, search, and analytics.

parameters.name: incident_type_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the incident type for which the custom field option will be created.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the Incident Type.

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the custom field to which the option will be added. This should be a string that specifies the field within the incident type.

parameters.name: accept_version_header
parameters.description: The versioning header to specify the API version for the request. Used in the 'Accept' header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_header
parameters.description: Specifies the MIME type for the request body, required to be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: custom_field_option_details
parameters.description: JSON object with details of the field option, including 'data_type' and 'value'.

data_type.description: The data type of the Field Option for the Custom Field.

value.description: The value of the Field Option for the Custom Field.

field_option.description: Details of the field option to be created.
